actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill entitled: "The Public Employees Social Security Equity Act of 1986".
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Social Security Act Amendments of 1983 to repeal provisions which reduce the old-age and disability benefits of individuals who reach age 62 after 1985 and who are eligible for a pension based on employment which is not covered under the Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance program.

titles.title: A bill entitled: "The Public Employees Social Security Equity Act of 1986".
